projects.name: NFT Gated Marketplace
projects.description: Developed the Front and Back-End of a NFT Gated Marketplace designed for PenFrens. User can connect their wallet and purchase that specific Animated NFT, then download it from our database.

projects.name: Blog
projects.description: Created the Front and Back-End of a Blog using Next.js, React, Node.js, GraphQL, and Hygraph. Users can create an account, login, and leave comments.

projects.name: Art Portfolio
projects.description: A static art website created to showcase artwork of a renowned grafitti artist in the San Jose area.

projects.name: IkonShop
projects.description: A marketplace built on the Solana Blockchain. Merchants can upload/sell their products for any SPL token and Users can create Pay Requests along with Tip Links via interactive dashboards. The app utilizes Javascript on the front-end and GQL for the back-end.

projects.name: Ethereum
projects.description: Ethereum is a decentralized, open-source blockchain with smart contract functionality

projects.name: MetaMask
projects.description: MetaMask is a browser extension that allows you to interact with the Ethereum blockchain

projects.name: Etherscan
projects.description: Etherscan is a block explorer and analytics platform for Ethereum
